GSD.description:
wifi: brcmfmac: Fix potential shift-out-of-bounds in brcmf_fw_alloc_request()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 87792567d9ed93fd336d2c3b8d7870f44e141e6d. For more details please see the references link.
